text: this is assuming the $14.9m is distributed evenly among the students though, no?

There's a box you can check on the registration page. I can't remember exactly what it says but it might be something like "Conditional add/drop". This won't drop your class unless you can get into the one you want to join. If you can't, it'll just throw an error and nothing changes. Since its full I'd talk to your advisor though.
